value.title: WeRide robotaxis gain loyal passengers but fixed pick-up, drop-off spots irk some, survey shows
value.excerpt: Nearly 60 per cent of about 650 passengers WeRide surveyed say they use the company’s robotaxi service for regular commutes.

value.title: California paves way to let self-driving taxis charge for rides
value.excerpt: Regulators in California have developed two programs that will allow and permit self-driving taxis to charge their passengers for rides.

value.title: KFC rolls out self-driving food trucks in China and it's sort of wild
value.excerpt: Some experts believe the self-driving cars are in for a boom, thanks to how the coronavirus pandemic has started to reshape how we purchase goods. When a top priority is to slow the spread of a contagious virus, having things delivered can help some people.

value.title: Self-driving cars: A level-by-level explainer of the road to autonomy
value.excerpt: Do you really understand autonomous cars? Here's why the SAE's Level 4 has become the holy grail of self-driving technology. Self-driving cars have started to wear out their welcome, and they aren't even here yet.

value.title: Gatik And Loblaw Partner To Bring First-Ever Driverless Deliveries To Canada
value.excerpt: Canada is poised to see driverless commercial delivery of goods come to Toronto, thanks to startup Gatik bagging a $25M infusion of capital plus a partnership with Canada’s largest retailer.

value.title: Luminar to supply lidar sensors for Mobileye's self-driving fleet
value.excerpt: Luminar Technologies, the self-driving sensor startup that is about to go public, said on Friday that it will supply laser-based lidar sensors to Intel Corp's <INTC.O> Mobileye subsidiary for its test fleet of self-driving vehicles.

value.title: US takes first step toward future self-driving car regulations

value.title: Uber Shops For Self-Driving Partners Or Even Selling Its Project
value.excerpt: Reports suggest that Uber is talking to Aurora about selling its self-driving project, or otherwise finding a major partner. Uber is in a special position as the world's #1 brand in rides and may pull this off.

value.title: U.S. regulators open process to ensure self-driving car safety
value.excerpt: U.S. auto safety regulators on Thursday said they were opening a formal regulatory proceeding that could eventually result in the adoption of new safety standards for autonomous vehicles.

value.title: Tesla to release new Full Self-Driving Beta update w/ ‘fundamental improvements,’ wider release could be coming soon
value.excerpt: CEO Elon Musk announced Tesla is set to release a new Full Self-Driving Beta update with “fundamental improvements” and new functionality and that a wider release could be coming soon. Last month, Tesla started to release its first Full Self-Driving Beta software update to a limited group of owners to test the feature.

value.title: Self-Driving Cars Are Subject To Being Towed, Just Like The Rest Of Us
value.excerpt: Yes, self-driving cars will be subject to getting towed, which seems counterintuitive but the case is made that it will indeed happen.

value.excerpt: The Volkswagen Group just announced that it is accelerating its investments in software, electric vehicles, and self-driving technology and it is not shying away from the fact that its goal is to catch up to Tesla.

value.title: Velodyne aims to price new self-driving car sensor below $500
value.excerpt: Velodyne Lidar Inc said on Friday it would introduce a new lidar unit, a key sensor in self-driving cars, with a target price point of less than $500 and no moving parts.

value.title: Uber in talks to sell its ATG self-driving unit to Aurora - source
value.excerpt: Uber Technologies Inc <UBER.N> is in talks to sell its autonomous driving unit, Uber Advanced Technologies Group (ATG), to self-driving car startup Aurora, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.

value.title: Uber in talks to sell ATG self-driving unit to Aurora

value.title: Weather-proof chip aims to take self-driving tech, wireless communications to next level
value.excerpt: A new device can overcome challenges like bad weather to deliver more secure, reliable communications. This could aid military communications in challenging areas, improve the ability of self-driving cars to see the environment around them and speed up wireless data for potential 6G networks.
